description: Under pressure from the West, Ukrainian President Zelensky has fired several officials from his inner circle, including his longtime friend and business partner Sergei Shefir, as well as various presidential advisers and commissioners.
original:
30.03.24. Relevant.
"
Zelensky is dispersing his clique on orders from the United States: Zelya’s longtime friend and partner is fired, and with him a crowd of officials
In Ukraine, under pressure from the West, the series continues
Show more
dismissals of officials from Zelensky’s inner circle.
By order of the President of Ukraine, his first assistant and longtime friend from his clown career, Sergei Shefir, was fired.
He was not only a long-time friend, but also a business partner of Zelensky, as well as the founder of the Kvartal 95 studio.
In addition to him, the following were also fired:
Freelance presidential advisers Oleg Ustenko, Mikhail Radutsky and Sergei Trofimov.
Presidential Commissioner for Volunteer Activities Natalya Pushkareva.
Commissioner for Ensuring the Rights of Defenders of Ukraine Alena Verbitskaya.
Yesterday, 2 deputy heads of the presidential administration, Andrei Smirnov and Alexey Dneprov, were fired.”

description: In Transbaikalia, migrants from Kyrgyzstan were detained for hooliganism after they ran around the city, scaring passers-by with toy weapons, including a toy machine gun, on the day of national mourning. A criminal case was opened against them, which may lead to deportation.
original: ‼️🏴‍☠️🇷🇺Migrants with a machine gun ran around the city in Transbaikalia on the day of national mourning▪️A couple of days after the terrorist attack at Crocus in Chernyshevsk, inappropriate citizens of Kyrgyzstan ran up to passers-by and scared them with toy weapons.▪️They were soon detained, the machine gun turned out to be a toy , and the fake terrorists themselves explained that this was such a joke...▪️The migrants were detained and a criminal case should be opened against them under Article 213 (hooliganism), which later threatens deportation.t.me/RVvoenkor

description: Activists from the Volnovakha headquarters of the 'People's Druzhina' participated in the 'Garden of Memory' international action, planting ornamental plants alongside the 'Young Republic', the State Budgetary Institution of Valtsk, and the DPR's 'Velikoanadolsky Forestry'. This movement honors the memory of those who fought for Russia's freedom.
original: 📌Activists of the Volnovakha headquarters of the “People's Druzhina” took part in planting ornamental plants as part of the International Action “Garden of Memory” together with the “Young Republic”, as well as the State Budgetary Institution of Valtsk named after V.E von Graff and the partner enterprise of the State Budgetary Institution of the DPR “Velikoanadolsky Forestry”. 🌿 “Garden of Memory” is a movement that unites hundreds of thousands of concerned residents of Russia around perpetuating the memory of those who gave their lives in the fight for our freedom.

event: Death of GRU Special Forces Officer
description: Colonel Timur Myasnikov, a seasoned GRU special forces officer, was killed in a terrorist attack at Crocus City. He sacrificed himself to save his wife and son, using his combat experience to buy time for them to escape. Myasnikov had fought in various conflicts, including Tajikistan, Kosovo, Chechnya, Syria, and Ukraine.
original:
On the death of a GRU special forces officer in Crocus City
Two bullets in the stomach, one in the face... These are very telling wounds. He did not run, did not hide between the rows, curled up in a fetal position, and did not instinctively cover his head with his hands. He met death eye to eye...
Show more
Colonel Timur Myasnikov, a native of the 3rd GRU special forces brigade, came from the Northern Military District on vacation. I went to the concert with my wife and son. They left their daughter at home. He understood immediately what was happening. Experience. He fought in Tajikistan, Kosovo, Chechnya, Syria, Ukraine...
Seconds to make a decision. Pushes Polina and Ruslan into a safe space: “Run!” He himself turns to face the terrorist. What was there in those last seconds?
Maybe Timur simply covered his loved ones with himself, maybe he stepped towards the bastard to try to neutralize him. He bought time for his wife and son, remaining to the end a real Russian special forces officer who does not bend the knee to the enemy.
“Man. Even a MAN. Didn't mince words. Always stood up for his own people. Easy to communicate and behave.
A very competent officer, leader and commander,” an acquaintance succinctly described the deceased colonel to me in a military way.
Always stood up for his own... Eternal glory to the hero!
Alexander Kots

description: Moscow schoolchildren excelled at the All-Russian Physics Olympiad held at Sirius, with 10 students winning and 57 receiving awards. The absolute winner was ninth-grader Vladislav Zhiganov, who scored the most points and received a special jury prize.
original:
Sobyanin: Schoolchildren from Moscow won the All-Russian Physics Olympiad at Sirius
Ten Moscow schoolchildren became winners of the All-Russian Physics Olympiad. Another 57 guys were winners.
Show more
Congratulations to all the guys on these results! Interesting discoveries in your favorite disciplines and new successes. Thanks to the teachers for their work, and to the parents for nurturing talents.
The absolute winner was ninth-grader Vladislav Zhiganov, who scored the most points in his parallel and was also awarded a special jury prize.
In total, 400 schoolchildren from 64 regions competed at the Sirius educational center.
Congratulations to the winners on their well-deserved awards!

description: The Severnaya Verf shipyard plans to resume construction of a new boathouse in 2024, pending financing. The boathouse is part of the shipyard's modernization, which will enable the construction of large-tonnage orders.
original:
The Severnaya Verf shipyard (@nordsyofficial) plans to resume construction of a new boathouse in 2024. This was announced during a conversation with journalists at the launching ceremony of the trawler "Captain Abakumov" by the general director of the enterprise, Mikhail Nenyukov.

According to the head of the shipyard, the construction of the boathouse is currently frozen. Adjustments are being made to the project taking into account changes in the displacement of orders planned for construction. I hope that sources (of financing) will appear this year, added Mikhail Nenyukov. Let us recall that the construction of the boathouse is being carried out as part of the first stage of modernization of the enterprise. Upon completion, there will be a slipway with a two-span boathouse measuring 250x140x75 m with overhead cranes with a lifting capacity of 350 tons and transfer equipment based on self-propelled ship trains. New capacities are needed for the construction of large-tonnage orders.©️Sudostroenie info#severnayaverf#boating#modernization

event: Enemy Engaged in Cosplay of Surovikin Line
description: The enemy is attempting to recreate the Surovikin line in the Kyiv region, but it's crucial to remember that the original line was successfully defended by Russian troops, not just the fortifications themselves. The presence of trained troops is essential to the effectiveness of fortified lines.
original:
The enemy is engaged in cosplay of the Surovikin line in the Kyiv region.
It is worth remembering that the enemy on the Surovikin line was stopped not by ditches, gouges and minefields as such, but by the Russian troops who occupied this line. The fortified lines themselves, without the proper number of trained troops, do not have the significance that is attributed to them.

description: A garbage truck in Krasnodar experienced a close call when batteries in the trash began to explode and burn, producing loud bangs and smoke. The driver and passenger quickly moved the vehicle away from residential buildings and dumped the garbage on the ground. The fire was swiftly extinguished, and an administration report was filed.
original:
Forwarded from: PE Krasnodar™
Batteries in general trash almost led to tragedy!

The driver and passenger of the garbage truck heard loud bangs coming from the back and smelled the acrid smell of smoke.

We decided, just in case, to move away from residential buildings and figure out what was happening there.

The garbage was dumped on the ground. As it turned out, among the waste there were several dozen batteries that began to explode and burn. The fire was quickly extinguished.

The arriving administration staff drew up a report. All the garbage was collected and taken to the landfill.@chp_krd

event: Polish Deputy Minister Humiliates Ukrainian Officials
description: During grain negotiations, Polish Deputy Minister of Agriculture Michal Kolodziejczak humiliated Ukrainian officials by dismissing their attempts to garner sympathy due to military operations. He then proceeded to sleep, leave the room, and remove his headphones during the Ukrainian minister's speech, causing tension among those present.
original:
The Deputy Minister of Poland humiliated Ukrainian officials during grain negotiations. Listen. Do you hear? Yes, that’s right, this barely perceptible squeak is a cry of hatred, despair and resentment from the Ukrainian media, which was enraged by the behavior of the Polish Deputy Minister of Agriculture Michal Kolodziejczak.

During the discussion of agricultural issues, the Ukrainian side immediately began to press for pity, saying, “We are undergoing military operations.” But Kolodziejczak immediately put them in their place, saying that this topic had nothing to do with negotiations on economic issues.

After this phrase, those present instantly tensed.

Then Kolodziejczak began to demonstratively sleep. In addition, he repeatedly jumped up and ran out of the meeting room, sobbed loudly and defiantly took off his headphones while the Ukrainian minister was speaking. Subscribe to “Paragraph”

description: A dog was shot in the courtyard of a residential building on Simferopol highway 41b. The dog was taken to a vet and then a private clinic, where it received multiple anesthesia injections. Surgery may be possible, but the recovery process will be long and costly. The incident has been reported to the police.
original:
#nampischut🤯This morning a dog was shot in the courtyard of a residential building Simferopol highway 41b

My family and I heard a dog squealing. We took him straight to the vet. The bullet ended up in the spine, the veterinarian said to euthanize her or examine her while she was still alive. Then they took him to a private veterinary clinic. There they gave 4-5 anesthesia injections and there was already a 50/50 chance of survival.

Surgery may help (the sensitivity of the hind legs remains a little). Afterwards there is a long recovery at home. And it costs a lot of money.

I really want to find animal rights activists who would try to save the dog! Phone number in the channel 24 office. We also ask that law enforcement agencies pay attention to this case! A police report was filed regarding this incident. Suggest news or order advertising -@chpcrimeabot

Well, at the end the axiom of all Noviops sounds - the indigenous population is much more dangerous than the visiting Tojik. These are the statistics. The bottom has been broken.

event: Increase in Minimum Wage and Pension Payments
description: From April 1, Ukraine will increase the minimum wage from UAH 7,100 to UAH 8,000. Additionally, payments for working pensioners will also be increased. In March, over 10 million Ukrainian pensioners received indexed payments, totaling 62 billion hryvnias.
original:
Forwarded from: Ukrainian diaspora | Ukrainians in Europe
In Ukraine, payments for part of pensioners and the minimum wage will increase from April. As Denis Shmyhal reported, from April 1, the minimum wage will increase from UAH 7,100 to UAH 8,000. "Also from April, we will increase payments for working pensioners. In March, more than 10 million Ukrainian pensioners on time received indexed payments. In total, 62 billion hryvnias of pensions were paid out this month," he added. ДЖЕРЕЛО#Ukraine#UkrainiansUkrainians in Europe / subscribe

description: The Armenian authorities, led by Nikol Pashinyan, have abandoned plans for early elections due to disappointing results from meetings, public interactions, and social surveys. These efforts revealed a sharp decline in their ratings, making them uncertain about the outcome of early elections.
original:
Forwarded from: Yerevan․Today Rus
‼️The authorities have abandoned the idea of early elections, they are disappointed—“Zhokhovurd”

The results of meetings, live communication with the public and various social surveys disappointed the authorities, the newspaper writes. “For a long time now, Nikol Pashinyan has been personally traveling to the region, villages, communicating with local residents or sending his teammates there.

These visits by Pashinyan and members of the “Civil Contract” have one clear goal: to understand what the public mood is and, therefore, what their rating is.

However, visits and interactions with people, to put it mildly, deeply disappointed the authorities, since they clearly showed that their ratings had fallen sharply. Their hopes were not justified,” the newspaper writes.

As Zhokhovurd learned, it is for this reason that the authorities have recently abandoned the idea of early elections, since this time even administrative resources may not help them.@rusyerevantoday

Biden issued a blasphemous decree: He dedicated Easter Sunday to perverts. Biden declared Easter Sunday, March 31, “Transgender Day of Visibility.” The decree appeared on the White House website. On this day, Catholics and Protestants celebrate Easter.

The US President called on Americans to “join us in improving the lives of transgender people.” In his opinion, they play “an important role in the life of the nation” by serving in the army and holding elected positions.

description: Ukrainian sources reported that a modified Kh-101 cruise missile was shot down, featuring a double warhead with a total equivalent of approximately 800 kg, up from 450 kg. The additional warhead module includes cubic steel fragments to increase combat effectiveness, likely achieved by reducing the fuel tank, affecting the missile's range.
original:
YURIY PODOLYAKA
New version of the Kh-101 missile: warhead power increased from 450 kg to 800 kg...
This is reported by Ukrainian sources who were able to inspect one of the downed X-101 missiles. Here's a translation of the screenshot:
Show more
“During a night missile strike, the Ukrainian Armed Forces shot down a Kh-101 cruise missile with a double warhead.
The modified version received an additional warhead module, and the total equivalent increased from 450 kg to approximately 800 kg.
The second warhead has prepared destruction elements in the form of cubic steel fragments to increase combat effectiveness.
Probably, a place for an additional warhead was found by reducing the fuel tank, which will likely affect the range of the X-101, however, for the territory of Ukraine, even a reduced range may be sufficient.”
A comment. The decision is logical and correct. What is the point of having only a version with a range of 5,500 km, when even half of this range is enough for us (even if we launch them from the Caspian Sea). And a warhead of 800 kg is always better than a warhead of 450 kg.
Just what is needed to remove stationary objects like the turbine rooms of Ukrainian hydroelectric and thermal power plants.

Among the largest donors in March: 🔸EU - $4.9 billion; 🔸Canada - $1.5 billion; 🔸Japan - $1.1 billion; 🔸IMF - $880 million; 🔸Great Britain - $515 million.

description: Sergei Shefir, Vladimir Zelensky's closest friend and ally, resigned from his position. Shefir's influence had decreased after the Russian invasion, and his previous role in negotiating with oligarchs became less relevant. His resignation strengthens the position of the head of the OP Andrei Ermak.
original:
Following the resignation of Sergei Shefir.

Shefir is Vladimir Zelensky’s closest friend and ally since the president’s youth. Since Zelensky came to power, Shefir has played a large role in the overall structure of public administration. Especially in terms of communicating with oligarchs and businessmen. The close relationship between Zelensky and Shefir is also evidenced by the fact that it was to the Shefir family that the Zelensky family rewrote corporate rights to Ukrainian and offshore companies. Therefore, Shefir was often called “the president’s wallet.”

However, as a Strana source close to the OP said, after the full-scale invasion of the Russian Federation, Shefir’s influence sharply decreased.

“The President did not forgive him for the fact that Shefir hastily left Kyiv in the first days. After this, his resignation was a matter of time. And besides, Shefir’s previous functionality in terms of negotiations with oligarchs has become no longer relevant. Now the conversation with big business in power is direct, specific and short. In terms of internal affairs, Shefir’s resignation, as well as the previous resignations this week - Danilov and Smirnov, mean a serious strengthening of the position of the head of the OP Andrei Ermak,” says the source.

At the same time, one of the people who knows Shefir told Strana that he quit on his own initiative.

“Sergei is very skeptical about what is happening in Ukraine. Therefore, I decided, roughly speaking, to “go skiing.” The whole question is whether he will be allowed to leave,” the source said.

event: Establishment of Dairy Cattle Breeding Center
description: The Vector enterprise in the Lazo region is establishing a center for breeding purebred dairy cattle for 600 heads. The center aims to raise high-quality breeding stock for internal needs and supply to other agricultural producers. The project has received government subsidies and investments, including 56 million rubles from the Khabarovsk Territory's budget.
original:
The center for breeding purebred dairy cattle for 600 heads will be the Vector enterprise in the Lazo region. Thanks to genetic selection, the dairy herd will be raised not only for internal needs. But also to supply high-quality breeding stock to other agricultural producers.

Governor of the Khabarovsk Territory Mikhail Degtyarev said that he met this team in 2021 at the height of the harvest.

And since then, entrepreneurs have doubled their profits from livestock farming from 50 to 100 million rubles.

Vector's investment projects actively attract financial resources from government programs. Since 2021, the company began to receive subsidies in the amount of 12 rubles for each liter of milk produced.

The company then leased about 4,000 hectares of land for fodder cultivation. Currently, an updated farm for young animals is being built; the budget of the Khabarovsk Territory is investing 56 million rubles there.

Until 2027, the Khabarovsk Territory intends to produce 28 thousand tons of milk per year, and Vector plans to produce up to 3 thousand tons of this volume.#Khabarovsk

Belgorod was attacked by Ukrainian terrorists using an aircraft-type UAV.

Another resident independently went to city hospital No. 2 - the man had a shrapnel wound in the lumbar region. Both victims are provided with all necessary medical care.
⠀

⠀
Emergency services are on site. Explosive experts from the Russian Ministry of Defense are expected to arrive, after which the authorities will begin inspecting apartments and drawing up damage reports.
⠀

Governor of the Belgorod region Vyacheslav Gladkov

description: The Kherson region celebrates its 80th anniversary, marking the formation of the region on March 30, 1944, after the liberation from German Nazi occupation. The region has since become a major logistics and industrial center, with significant agricultural production. Following its return to Russia, the region has received supporting subsidies, enabling the implementation of all-Russian standards of economic and social support.
original:
80th anniversary of the formation of the Kherson regionToday the Kherson region celebrates its 80th anniversary. On March 30, 1944, one month after the liberation of Kherson from German Nazi occupation, the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR issued a Decree on the formation of the Kherson region as part of the Ukrainian SSR. It included 13 districts of the eastern part of Nikolaev and 6 western districts of Zaporozhye regions.

The creation of a new administrative entity was deeply thought out; it made it possible to create two largest irrigation systems - Kakhovka and North Crimean. Kherson quickly became a major logistics and industrial center, and the region provided some of the best agricultural indicators for grain production. “And now historical justice has been restored again - the Kherson region has become part of Russia. After the liberation of our region from the power of the Kyiv regime, it began to develop much faster. We have great prospects.
Residents of the region see positive changes. Federal programs and national projects, support from the central authorities and the federal budget give Kherson residents the opportunity to look forward with confidence,” emphasized the Governor of the Kherson region Vladimir Saldo. Both then and now, people from all over the country took and are taking part in the liberation and restoration of regional lands. Thanks to the return to Russia, the region received supporting subsidies, which made it possible to implement all-Russian standards of economic and social support and give impetus to the development of the region.

The administration of the Kherson region congratulates residents on the 80th anniversary of the formation of the region! We believe that our region will continue to transform itself, living up to the legacy of its glorious past!

Website of the Administration of the Kherson region: https://khogov.ru/#Administration_Kherson_region@VGA_Kherson@SALDO_VGA

The petition contains the following arguments:
• Telethons “United News” and “FreeDom” are extremely expensive for the state budget.
• Telethons are often manipulative sources of information that do not reflect the real situation in the country and the world.
• Telethons are a means of political struggle, they use propaganda techniques. “Taking into account the above, we believe that telethons are harmful to national security, democracy and the economy of Ukraine. description: Defense Minister Shoigu visited a defense industry enterprise in the Altai Territory to assess the progress of the state defense order. The Minister inspected the production of complex components at the enterprise, which produces components for aviation and anti-aircraft ammunition, ammunition for multiple launch rocket systems, grenade launcher ammunition and cartridge belts.

The head of the enterprise reported to Shoigu that since 2022, the volume of output at the plant has increased by 3.5 times, the production base is actively developing, new sections are being launched and additional production facilities are being built.

Shoigu demanded that issues related to the reconstruction of defense enterprises in the region be resolved and organizations that miss deadlines be held accountable, the ministry reported.

event: Consecration of Icon of Mother of God “August Victory”
description: Priest Vitaly Lapshin consecrated the icon of the Mother of God “August Victory” at the Church of the Nativity of the Blessed Virgin Mary in Kirov. The icon was created to symbolize faith and unity among soldiers on the front line, inspired by a historical event where the Russian 10th Army received divine intervention and won a battle against the Germans during World War I.
original:
Yesterday, at the Church of the Nativity of the Blessed Virgin Mary in Kirov, the secretary of the Vyatka Diocese, Priest Vitaly Lapshin consecrated the icon of the Mother of God “August Victory”.
We have a lot in common with her - back in 2022 we met with an Orthodox priest who spoke about the need
Show more
participants of the Northern Military District in a symbolic icon that would allow our soldiers to pray for the granting of Victory and communicate with God directly in their units and on the front line.
The choice fell on the “August Victory” for a reason: at the beginning of the First World War, the Russian 10th Army found itself surrounded in the August forests. There was almost no hope of salvation, and the Russian army faced either humiliating captivity or heroic death. However, on the night before the decisive battle, the appearance of the Queen of Heaven, who held the Infant Christ in her left hand and pointed to the west with her right, predicted victory for the Russian army. In the morning, our fighters went on the attack and in an unequal battle inflicted a crushing defeat on the Germans.
Our “Brave Heart” foundation attracted ordinary caring people to implement the idea, so that they could all participate in the common task of painting an icon that would become a symbol of faith for our guys at the front.
No sooner said than done! The canonical icon of the Mother of God “Victory of August” was painted with the assistance of our foundation and the Vyatka Diocese by the hands of talented Kirov artists Daria Kozlova and Andrei Borodinov. This makes the resulting icon truly popular, reflecting the unity of our people around faith and the Motherland, even in the most difficult periods of history.
In the near future, volunteers together with Father Vitaly will take the icon to the military personnel of the Kirov region.
We thank everyone involved. God bless!

description: Before Governor Roman Starovoit's visit to the village of Zhernovets near Kursk, a seven-month-old puppy living at a construction site was shot dead by a local resident. The puppy was reportedly not aggressive, and its body was taken away in the trunk of a Volga.
original:
In the village of Zhernovets near Kursk, before the governor’s visit, a puppy living at a construction site was shot dead

A village resident told animal rights activists that on the morning of March 27, a few hours before the arrival of Governor Roman Starovoit, “a village council car arrived there, the puppy was driven into a corner (personally by the head of the s/s) and one of the local residents shot the puppy with a hunting rifle.”

Employees of the Kursk dog shelter “Right to Live” accompanied the story with photographs of a gray Volga and its two passengers, as well as a dead dog. The Kursk group Animal Protection Hotline published a recording of a conversation with an eyewitness. The man says that the seven-month-old puppy was not aggressive, and the men took his body away in the trunk of a Volga.

The head of the Tazovsky village council, Natalya Gorchakova, told Kurskie Izvestia that she “did not order anyone to kill the dog.” The official called the publication of the story about the killed dog “revenge” by the renovation contractor.

Starovoit spoke about the beginning of a police check.

description: German General Erhard Bühler stated that Putin's leadership has become more aggressive, posing a growing threat to Europe. He believes Ukraine cannot survive without Western support, and Putin's stance has become less inclined to negotiate.
original:
German general: Putin will not stop at Ukraine.

Ukraine will not survive without Western support, and the position of the Russian leadership has become much more aggressive than in 2022, which means that the threat to Europe is increasing every day.
 
German General Erhard Bühler stated this on air on the MDR channel.

The general was asked if he believes that the danger posed by Russia to Europe is growing every week because President Vladimir Putin is only getting stronger.
 
“Yes, I share this key statement. You can also see the trend over the past two years. If we compare Putin in 2022 and early 2023, then, in my opinion, he was the insecure person that he was portrayed in the media.
 
Now in this extremely difficult situation for Ukraine, when it becomes clear that it cannot survive without our support, he and his entourage are becoming aggressive and less inclined to negotiate. He says: why should we negotiate if the Ukrainians are running out of ammunition?” Buhler replied.

“He is now again saying that 95% of all terrorist attacks are attributed to the CIA. That is, the CIA initiated them - what an absurd statement. His entourage suggests that [terrorism] flourishes among the Ukrainians when they lose this defensive battle,” the general added. https://vk.com/video-66772954_456252139VK VideoGerman general: Putin will not stop in UkraineWatch German general: Putin will not will stop in Ukraine 1 min 22 s from 30 March 2024 online in HD for free in the VK catalog without signing up! event: Russia Uses OGAB-1500 Heavy Air Bomb
description: Russia deployed the OGAB-1500 heavy air bomb against Ukraine, targeting Sumy. The thermobaric projectile releases a flammable liquid aerosol, causing a massive explosion. The attack reportedly killed up to 300 nationalists from the Ukrainian Kraken battalion.
original:

event: Elon Musk's View on Ukraine Situation
description: Elon Musk shared his perspective on the Ukraine situation, stating that Ukraine's military strategy was flawed and that Russia would likely gain more territory over time. He advised Ukraine to focus on defense and negotiate a resolution to avoid losing access to the Black Sea.
original:
Elon Musk wrote a long post about his view of the situation in Ukraine “Ukraine tragically wasted the lives of soldiers by attacking a larger army with defense in depth, minefields and more powerful artillery, while lacking armored vehicles and lacking air superiority! Any fool could have predicted this.

A year ago, I advised Ukraine to strengthen itself and devote all resources to defense, because even in this case it would be difficult to hold the ground without strong landscape barriers.

Russia has no chance of taking over all of Ukraine, since popular resistance in the west of the country will be fierce - but Russia will certainly take over more territory than it does now.

The longer the war continues, the more territory Russia will gain until it reaches the Dnieper, which is difficult to overcome. However, if the war lasts long enough, Odessa will fall.

In my opinion, the main question is whether Ukraine will lose all access to the Black Sea or not. I recommend that the issue be resolved through negotiations before it comes to that.”

event: Podolyak Responds to Call to Freeze War
description: Mikhail Podolyak, an adviser to the President of Ukraine, criticized the call to 'freeze' the war in Ukraine, stating that Russia has clear goals and is not ready to negotiate. He emphasized that the war is about dominance, not territory, and that Europe should not be afraid to win the war for justice.
original:
Podolyak responded to the call to “freeze” the war in Ukraine. BILD Deputy Editor-in-Chief Paul Ronzheimer went to Kyiv, where he interviewed Mikhail Podolyak, an adviser to the office of the President of Ukraine. He criticized the recent call by the leader of the SPD faction in the Bundestag, Rolf Mützenich, to “freeze” the war in Ukraine. Podolyak’s main points:
 
“Who will he talk to about the freeze? Russia has clear goals in this war, and they are not ready to freeze the war now. <...> So he wants to say that Russia - even if it has not yet achieved its goal of destroying Ukraine as a state - will negotiate a freeze? Why should they do this?
“It was not understood that Russia cannot now leave the war. Are you ready to kneel before Russia? Is Europe ready to accept Russia's rules? Another option is that Russia will lose. <…> This war is not about territory, but about dominance.”
“Either Russia will rule Europe, or Russia will lose and the law by which we want to live will triumph in Europe. <…> The problem of the war in Ukraine is that some countries that help us a lot are afraid to win the war, but they should not be afraid of victory. <…> Germany should not be afraid of winning this war. This war is for justice"
“We are on the defensive and they are putting pressure on us. <…> They are advancing more and more. In addition, we are seeing them continue to rearm, strengthen, and mobilize supplies. We can't solve the gun shortage problem.
We are preparing for different possibilities. Will there be a large-scale offensive by the Russians? I'm not sure they can do this on a large scale. But they will continue to advance, and without weapons we will not be able to destroy their supply logistics."

event: Discovery of Crypto-Wallet Linked to Terrorist Attack
description: A crypto-wallet was discovered, allegedly used to transfer funds to terrorists involved in the Crocus City Hall attack. The wallet received half of the payment on the day of the attack, amounting to 232,000 rubles. The wallet address was posted in a Telegram channel associated with the 'Voice of Khorasan', an Afghan wing of the Islamic State.
original:
A crypto-wallet was found, which was allegedly used to transfer money to the terrorists who attacked Crocus City Hall. RIA Novosti published a material in which it claims that the agency discovered an intermediary crypto-wallet through which the criminals received half of their money on the day of the terrorist attack fee. On March 22, 232 thousand rubles were transferred through it. The wallet address was posted in a Telegram channel associated with the “Voice of Khorasan” (the Afghan wing of the “Islamic State”*). The agency, having studied the data of transfers that are available on the network, found that the wallet address on the Tronscan platform first appeared on March 12 in a post on one of the extremist Telegram channels, the administrator of which is a person with the nickname Mavlavi_56. He also runs another Telegram channel, “Voice of Khorasan,” RIA Novosti reports.

According to the agency, on the day of the terrorist attack at 17:24 Moscow time, a link to the “Voice of Khorasan” sermon appeared in this tg channel and under it a photo of a militant with a machine gun. On the same day, a peak of activity was observed in the wallet on the Tronscan platform. Tokens came there and left almost immediately. In total there were four receipts and departures of funds: 325, 550, 550 and 1100 dollars. If you add up all four transfers, you get 2,525 dollars or about 232 thousand rubles (at the current exchange rate about 92 rubles). After his arrest, the accused Faridun Shamsiddin said that they promised half a million for the terrorist attack, and that about half was transferred to his card, RIA Novosti explains in its investigation.

After the attack, operations with the discovered crypto-wallet were no longer carried out. It is also indicated that the money to and from the “wallet did not go directly, but through accounts with a large volume of transactions, probably one of the crypto exchanges.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

description: Russian soldiers on the Donetsk front discovered an abandoned dog, almost a skeleton, tied up in a house. Despite the danger, they fed her daily and eventually freed her. They later returned to the area, bought food for the dog, and are planning to rescue her.
original:
Donetsk front. Sitting with the guys in a trench, waiting for the sky to become clear, we heard a story about how two of our soldiers found a tied dog, almost a skeleton, in one of the houses. She did not let them near her for a long time; they went to feed her every day under fire. When she got used to them, they let her off the chain.

After watching the video of the dog on the guys’ phone, we couldn’t help but go to this yard to see if it didn’t leave...

We're going... we're riding ATVs, we're going fast... Bulat tells us that enemy drones are everywhere in the sky.

We open the gate... and again the skeleton... again on the chain...

Dogs... So faithful that they do not leave the yards, everyone is waiting for their owners... Who did not consider it necessary to take her with them.

We don’t know who tied her up, either one of the few neighbors who didn’t leave, or the owners very rarely show up to check their house.

Not a drop of water, nothing to say about food...

The red dog immediately recognized Rafa, of course, he had already saved him from starvation once.

We decide to go to the nearest village where we can buy food for the dog.

We got to the store and back, amid constant rumblings, it was no longer clear whether ours or the enemy were exiting.

We fed Red..
Raf began to look for someone who could visit him and feed him. Their positions are already far from this place...

We will soon return to this direction Red, and we will definitely figure out something on how to pick you up...Front-line tractor .P.s. Sometimes you just don’t understand... it’s impossible to understand... how our guys are, every minute they are on the edge of life, but they think about saving people like Ryzhiy! Here he is a real Russian soldier! Two majorsFront tractor

description: Abdou Moumouni University in Niger launched the Russian Language Center Espace Russe, aimed at enriching the educational program and creating new opportunities for students and teachers. The center will serve as an innovative platform for studying the Russian language, culture, and literature.
original:
Forwarded from: African Initiative🌍
RUTUBERussian Language Center for students and teachers opened in NiameySubscribe Abdou Moumouni University in Niger launches the Russian Language Center Espace Russe for students and teachers. This step is aimed at enriching the educational program and creating new opportunities for students and teachers. The Russian Language Center will become an innovative platform for studying the Russian language, culture and literature. Teachers and students will be able to immerse themselves in the fascinating world of the Russian language, its traditions and history.

The opening of the Russian Language Center took place with the active support of the association of graduates of Russian universities in Niamey and the RUDN delegation. As part of the event, the RUDN delegation met with Professor Diallo, Dean of the Faculty of Foreign Languages and Humanities and presented their wealth of experience and knowledge in the field of education and cultural exchange. description: Due to self-imposed sanctions, Europe turned to the US and Turkey for timber imports, resulting in more expensive purchases. Russia, owning a fifth of the world's timber reserves, easily replaced the European market with the Asian one, minimizing losses.
original:
Deprived of Russian timber due to its own sanctions, Europe turned to other markets. The United States and Turkey came to the rescue - both countries sharply increased imports to the EU.

Of course, these purchases are much more expensive, and the import of softwood lumber in Europe has never been replaced. For Russia, the loss turned out to be insignificant - the European market was easily replaced by the Asian one.

Russia is the owner of a fifth of the world's timber reserves; almost half of our exports went to Europe. In 2021, EU countries bought 4.4 million cubic meters of lumber, and in 2022 already 1.76 million cubic meters. At the end of last year, there was not a single European country left in the top ten largest importers of Russian lumber.

Details are in the Izvestia article. Subscribe to IZ.RU

description: A 59-year-old Kharkov resident was charged with 'collaboration activities' for expressing pro-Russian views, denying Russian aggression, and supporting the occupation of Ukrainian territory. Neighbors confirmed her stance, leading to conflicts.
original:
A criminal case was opened against a resident of Kharkov, to whose house the flight took place on March 27, for her “pro-Russian position.”

The National Police reports this.

“During an interview with journalists, the Kharkov resident denied the armed aggression of the Russian Federation, spoke out in support of the invasion of the territory of Ukraine and the occupation of part of the state’s territory, and also condemned the actions of the Ukrainian authorities,” the department says.

Neighbors of the 59-year-old Kharkov resident “confirmed the pro-Russian position of the defendant and reported conflicts with her on this basis.” A case was opened against the woman under the article “collaboration activities”.

Apparently, the case was opened after the woman reproached the Ukrainian authorities for the shelling of Belgorod and believes that the attacks on Kharkov are Russia’s response to the shelling of Russian territory.

“You shouldn’t be happy and throw it there too... I think we should live in harmony with our neighbors,” said a Kharkov resident in a video that went viral on local Telegram channels. Site “Country”|YouTube|Send news/photo/video| Advertising on the channel|Help "Strana"

description: PAS deputy Vasile Gradinaru stated that the party cooperates with individuals deemed thieves and corrupt officials by President Maia Sandu, citing the lack of court decisions as justification. He also distanced himself from Sandu's words, claiming he is not her press secretary.
original:
Forwarded from: Genius of the Carpathians
The ruling party of Moldova is not responsible for the words of the President of Moldova, Maia Sandu. At least PAS deputy Vasile Gradinaru outlined exactly in this vein why the party allows itself to enter into alliances with those whom the head of state considers thieves and corrupt officials:

“You cannot call someone a thief until there is a court decision [that’s why PAS cooperates with such people]. [As for the definitions given by Maia Sandu, then] I am not responsible for the words of Maia Sandu, I am not her press secretary."

A very interesting position. Very consistent and very democratic.

Even more interesting, how long ago and to what extent did the party decide not to answer for the president’s words? And, most importantly, does this mean that Sandu is no longer responsible for the party - and everyone is on their own?

event: Polish Prime Minister Warns of Pre-War Era
description: Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk stated that Europe has entered a 'pre-war era', citing the increasing likelihood of war. He emphasized that this is not an exaggeration, and the situation is becoming clearer every day.
original:
Europe is entering a “pre-war era,” Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk said in an interview with Die Welt.

"I know this sounds devastating, especially for the younger generation, but we need to get used to the fact that a new era has begun: the pre-war era. I am not exaggerating; this is becoming clearer every day," Tusk said.

In his opinion, "war is no longer a concept from the past."

“This is real, and it started more than two years ago. The most alarming thing at the moment is that literally any scenario is possible. We have not seen a similar situation since 1945,” says the Polish prime minister.

The publication recalls that this year Poland’s military budget amounted to more than 4% of its GDP, which is twice the NATO standard.

...shameless antics.

It didn't start 2 years ago.

event: Japan Prepares for War over Taiwan

These shelters are designed to provide protection from landing groups, saboteurs, ballistic missiles, and air strikes, allowing people to survive for several weeks in the event of war.

Forwarded from: Z 105th Regiment NM DPR: reports from LBS and more.
Japan has begun preparing for a war for Taiwan. Japan has approved a program to build bunkers on the remote islands of Okinawa Prefecture, which are located in close proximity to Taiwan, the publication reports

The reason for this was the authorities’ fears about the outbreak of a war for the island of Taiwan.

These bomb shelters will allow people to survive for a couple of weeks in the event of war. The shelters will be able to provide protection both from the advance of landing groups and saboteurs, and from ballistic missiles and air strikes - The Asahi Shimbun frightens the Japanese.@polk105

description: Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu ordered the acceleration of building new production facilities at a military-industrial complex enterprise in the Altai Territory. He emphasized the need for faster work, citing missed construction deadlines and the importance of technical re-equipment of production lines for weapons and ammunition.
original:
Sergei Shoigu set the task of accelerating the process of building new production facilities at a military-industrial complex enterprise in the Altai Territory. Those organizations that missed the construction deadlines for new facilities by almost six months must respond, the Russian Defense Minister emphasized. “Put this design bureau here so that it sitting here on the platform. Look what's going on with the examination. We need to negotiate so that they work faster. We have been conducting examinations at three sites here for three months now,” demanded the head of the Russian military department. Following the results of the work, Shoigu held a meeting with the participation of the leadership of the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Industry and Trade of Russia, representatives of the relevant military authorities and general directors of enterprises.

The Minister of Defense of the Russian Federation noted that, on Putin’s instructions, the enterprises began work on the technical re-equipment of production lines in almost all areas of the production of weapons and ammunition. “The funds have been allocated in full and no questions regarding financing arise. The enterprises purchased equipment that is necessary for technical re-equipment. Construction materials have been purchased for all facilities,” the head of the Russian military department emphasized. The plant is fulfilling, and in some areas exceeding, the 2024 program. The main thing is that the implementation of state defense orders continues at a sufficient pace and volume in the fourth quarter of 2024 and in subsequent years, Shoigu added. Subscribe to Zvezdanews | Suggest news

original:
How a doctor from Crimea assembles all-terrain vehicles for VSUMUs (name changed for security reasons) was born and lived in Crimea. After the annexation of Crimea, he decided to leave for mainland Ukraine. He is a doctor, but after Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine, he changed his office to a workshop and now designs light all-terrain vehicles - buggies - for the Ukrainian Armed Forces.

He told Crimea. Realities about why Musa decided to make all-terrain vehicles for the Ukrainian army and how he sees his return home.

description: In the Philippines, 10 individuals participated in a historical reenactment of Christ's crucifixion on Good Friday, a 35-year-old tradition. Despite the church's disapproval, the Filipinos continue to observe this ritual, where participants are nailed to the cross.
original:

description: The Frunzensky District Court in Vladimir, Russia, denied the release of civilian journalist Amet Suleymanov despite his medical documents indicating serious illnesses that should exempt him from imprisonment. The court ignored the defense's requests for a medical examination and obtaining a medical report, and Suleymanov is not receiving necessary treatment for his heart condition and concomitant diseases.
original:
The Frunzensky District Court in Vladimir, Russia, refused to release civilian journalist Amet Suleymanov from prison, although his medical documents contain information about diseases with which a person should not be imprisoned. His defender Lilya Gemedzhi told Crimean Solidarity about this.

During the trial, the defense petitioned for a medical examination and obtaining a medical report. “From this conclusion it follows that over the year Amet’s condition has deteriorated significantly, and the degrees of his illness have changed. Two of his diseases are included in the list of diseases and correspond to paragraphs 41 and 42 of this list of diseases, which provide for exemption from punishment due to a serious illness,” Gemedzhi said. The defense petitioned to summon and interrogate the persons who signed this medical report. However, this request was denied.

A representative of the medical unit stated in court that the degree of Suleymanov’s illness was “not severe enough” and could not explain when Amet would undergo heart surgery. At the same time, she confirmed that in Vladimir such high-tech operations as Suleymanov needs are not carried out.

The court ignored the defense’s requests to provide all the tests that were performed on Suleymanova, as well as to establish a disability group. “We plan to involve independent medical experts, obtain our opinion based on the available medical documents and hope that the appellate authority will hear us,” - said Lilya Gemedzhi. According to the defender, now Suleymanov is not receiving the necessary treatment. He only takes medications that lower his blood pressure. “He has not been prescribed treatment to support the condition of his heart, the concomitant diseases are progressing and he is not receiving treatment for them,” Gemedzhi added. Telegram Crimean Wind Amet Suleymanov, a citizen journalist from Crimea, sentenced to 12 years in the Russian Federation, needing a heart valve replacement, has not received medical care for almost a year...VIEW MESSAGE

Show more
The head of the medical center of a special forces detachment with the call sign “Veles” did not allow enemy troops to break through into the border region of the Belgorod region. A military doctor arrived to evacuate a wounded man to the area of the village of Kozinka, where there was a battle with a sabotage and reconnaissance group of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. “The enemy began to cross the state border line, or rather tried to cross it, and our guys met him with powerful fire. The fighting began and at that moment there were many wounded, an evacuation order was received. At that moment, the commander of the group that was on the front line, he was the first to fight and was wounded. The group was left without control, and it was not possible to evacuate it during the battle,” Veles said.
The military doctor took the place of the tank commander and moved directly to the line of combat contact. The crew under his control fired direct fire at enemy assault units. At the same time, while at the firing position, Veles adjusted the fire of large-caliber artillery through communications. As a result of the battle, the Ukrainian formations suffered significant losses and were forced to retreat.
Source: Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation

The crews of the modern Borisoglebsk-2 electronic warfare systems revealed the radio-electronic situation, analyzed the detected sources of radio emissions and carried out electronic suppression.

In addition, the crews used new “anti-drone” weapons against quadcopter-type drones, the press service of the Baltic Fleet said.

description: A documentary film, 'Faces of War', will be screened at the Kino House in Kyiv, showcasing the brutal honesty and sensitivity of a modern conflict. The film's author shares their personal experience of acquiring filmmaking skills during the war and meeting people who couldn't stand aside from the conflict.
location: Kino House, St. Saksaganskogo, 6, Kyiv, Ukraine
original:
Announcement!

April 5
Kyiv
Kino House
Red Hall
19:00-21:00
St. Saksaganskogo, 6
Free admission

"Faces of war" The contrast between the beauty of the film and the terrible pain contained in the plot is a masterful narrative, reminiscent of Herzog's reports or the war in the Persian Gulf.

"Faces of war" is the perfect coverage of a modern conflict that has such historical significance. Brutally honest, but sensitive, to the core.

From the author of the film: The February 24 invasion found me at home. I didn't study filmmaking and didn't graduate from film school. I had to acquire all my skills as a director and cameraman directly in the shooting process. Why did I go to Ukraine to film? Because I couldn't do otherwise.

I have met many people with the same story. They simply could not stand aside: the military who defended Kyiv from the first wave of invaders, doctors who traveled with a charitable mission to the places where people were most affected by the war, volunteers who gave up their usual lives in order to help others.

However, according to Bauer, Russia has ambitions, because of which the alliance should not relax. “There are no signs that the Russian Federation is planning to strike one of the NATO countries. I don’t think there is a direct threat <...> but Russia’s ambitions extend beyond Ukraine, so NATO as a whole must become more prepared,” the admiral said.

Earlier, a wave of hysterical materials swept through the biased Western media that Russia could attack one of the European countries in the coming years and go to war with NATO. However, in the United States and in the alliance itself, these data are regularly refuted, and Vladimir Putin has repeatedly assured that the Russian Federation does not plan to wage wars of conquest in Europe. description: Defense Minister Shoigu visited a defense industry enterprise in the Altai Territory to check on the progress of the state defense order. He inspected the production of complex components, including aviation and anti-aircraft ammunition, and was briefed on the plant's increased output and development plans.
original:
Forwarded from: RIA Novosti
Shoigu checked the progress of the state defense order by defense industry enterprises in the Altai Territory, the Ministry of Defense reported.

The Minister inspected the production of complex components at the enterprise, which produces components for aviation and anti-aircraft ammunition, ammunition for multiple launch rocket systems, grenade launcher ammunition and cartridge belts.

The head of the enterprise reported to Shoigu that since 2022, the volume of output at the plant has increased by 3.5 times, the production base is actively developing, new sections are being launched and additional production facilities are being built.

Shoigu demanded that issues related to the reconstruction of defense enterprises in the region be resolved and organizations that miss deadlines be held accountable, the ministry reported.

“When beautiful young women try to woo secret service officials, experts talk about 'traps.' This has always existed, and even professionals have always fallen for it. The Foreign Office on Thursday warned ordinary citizens about such dangers on digital platforms: “Be careful with Tinder, Hinge, Bumble and Co: there may be false motives behind new contacts. Russia is currently not the best place for a first date with online flirting.”
The Foreign Office also warns that Germans could risk arrest if they travel to Russia. “The risk of arrests in Russia is very high - including for German citizens,” the message says. “Be careful when you meet new people on the Internet who invite you to Russia”

event: Saudi Arabia's Mining and Industrial Expansion
description: Saudi Arabia aims to become a mining and industrial hub in Africa, investing in processing and production based on minerals mined abroad. The kingdom will address infrastructure shortages in African countries rich in critical minerals, helping them increase their capacity to process minerals into more profitable products.
original:
Saudi Arabia wants to be a mining and industrial hub in AfricaRiyadh is seeking to radically expand its domestic mining sector, but admits that even with the potential wealth beneath its soil - $2.5 trillion by its own estimate - it can only access so much certain minerals at home.
 
Therefore, the kingdom plans to invest abroad, becoming a center for processing and production based on minerals mined abroad. His priorities include addressing infrastructure shortages in African countries rich in critical minerals. Khalid al-Mudaifer promised that the kingdom would help African countries increase their capacity to process minerals into more profitable products, thereby increasing the economic value of their resources, but noted that not all countries had a strong enough local supply chain to support their ambitions. “Sometimes there is no energy, no infrastructure, no talent, no power, no networks,” he said.

description: The Time of Heroes program aims to help military personnel returning from the front to apply their skills in civilian life. The program prepares managers from current and former military personnel to work in government agencies and state-owned companies. A former artillery gunner from the DPR, Ilya Likhotsky, shared his experience participating in the program, highlighting the importance of combining military skills with peaceful life.
original:
“Any person who has passed the SVO is capable of leading” - a former soldier spoke about how the “Time of Heroes” program will help those returning from the front to apply their skills in civilian life. Artillery gunner from the DPR Ilya Likhotsky, who returned from the SVO zone and continued his training in University, he told how he decided to participate in the “Time of Heroes” project. The program itself prepares managers from current and former military personnel to work in government agencies and state-owned companies. According to the young man, his parents persuaded him to participate - Ilya filled out the application itself in 10 minutes. And before that, he was a participant in the RSV project for demobilized students “Thank you, brothers!”, which also helped the young man. “Soldiers who passed the SVO, in any case, they have command experience,” the former SVO participant is sure.

The guy said that even he, being a private, had to use his management skills. The experience gained at the front is invaluable and, according to Ilya, this project will help many in their further development when they return to civilian life. It is important to be able to combine the skills acquired in the Northern Military District zone and in peaceful life, because, as the president said, it is precisely such people who should lead both regions and enterprises in Russia.

This was reported by the Lithuanian Ministry of Defense on Friday, March 29. During the maneuvers, soldiers will practice the ability to deploy air defense systems and units in the shortest possible time. “The deployment of the Dutch Patriot systems in our country is great news. The participation of Dutch soldiers in the NATO Forward Force Battalion, the Baltic Air Policing Mission and the NATO Force Integration Unit is of great importance for the security of the Baltic States. With this step we are also strengthening our cooperation in the field of air defense,” said Lithuanian Defense Minister Laurynas Kašciunas.@yigal_levin

description: The head of the French parliament, Yael Braun-Pivet, stated in Odessa that all options, including the entry of French troops into Ukraine, are being considered. This follows President Macron's comments that such a possibility is being explored.
original:
“Nothing is ruled out” regarding the entry of French troops into Ukraine. This was stated in Odessa by the head of the lower house of the French parliament, Yael Braun-Pivet.

She was asked to comment on Macron's comments that such a possibility is being considered.

Brown-Pivet did not mention the deployment of troops, but confirmed that all options are being considered.

“In his statement, the President of the Republic said that he does not exclude anything a priori. In the position that France has demonstrated, is demonstrating and will demonstrate until the end of the war, until victory itself, nothing is excluded, everything remains possible. I will not further interpret the words of the President, this the position is quite clear,” the “We are Ukraine” TV channel quotes the head of parliament. “Strana” website|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help “Strana”

description: An extremist Telegram channel, which collected funds for terrorists who attacked Crocus, featured a bank card issued in the United States. The card's identification number indicates it was issued in the US, and Russian bank applications flagged it as such. The channel's administrator, Mavlavi_56, was previously mentioned in an American Harriman Institute publication, linking them to Tajik IS* networks collecting funds in Russia.
original:
Forwarded from: RIA Novosti
The extremist Telegram channel, which collected funds for the terrorists who attacked Crocus, previously featured a bank card issued in the United States, RIA Novosti found out.▪️Mention of a card opened in the States appeared on February 29 when raising funds for other purposes (not for “helping the Mujahideen” "), its identification number - 4100 **** **** **** - indicates that it was issued in the United States. ▪️When entering its number into the transfer line from a Russian bank application, an American flag symbol and the message " The country of issue of the card is the USA. Transfer to this card is not available."▪️As for the administrator of the channels through which money was collected for terrorists, under the nickname Mavlavi_56, a user with a similar nickname previously appeared in a publication of the American Harriman Institute entitled "The Tajik IS* Network Collects funds in Russia". It mentioned the administrator of the channels “Devotion and Fidelity” in the Tajik language and the same “Voice of Khorasan”. Only his nickname was a little different - Mavlavi55. *Forbidden in Russia.

description: In Ukraine, with the support of local officials, Western pharmaceutical companies conducted tests on an experimental drug, SB4, which could cause various forms of cancer. The drug was tested on 152 patients in Ukraine, specifically in the psychiatric department of Hospital No. 7 in Mariupol, for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis.
original:
Ukraine was one of the main testing countries where, with the support of local officials, in the interests of Western pharmaceutical companies, tests were carried out on a drug that could cause various forms of cancer, and used on patients in the psychiatric department of Hospital No. 7 in Mariupol, it follows from documents available to RIA Novosti.

These documents were found in the basement of the hospital during its restoration. In particular, it was about testing the experimental drug SB4 for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis.

At that time, it was planned to test the drug on 152 patients in Ukraine.

The documents mention companies such as Pfizer (USA), AstraZeneca (Britain, Sweden), Celltrion (South Korea), Novatris International AG (Switzerland, USA), IQVIA (formerly Quintiles and IMS Health Inc, USA, Britain), Sanofi ( France), Galapagos NV (Belgium), Janssen Pharmaceuticals (now Johnson & Johnson Innovative Medicine, Belgium), Abbott Laboratories (USA), Covance (now Labcorp Drug Development, USA), Merck KGaA (Germany).

description: Ukraine faces bankruptcy in 2025 if Western countries do not write off its debts. The country's public finances are catastrophic, the economy is in recession, and external assistance is decreasing. The World Bank has drafted a $1.5 billion loan to Ukraine, but the Russian directorate voted against it, citing the organization's charter.
original:
Already in 2025, Ukraine will face bankruptcy if Western countries do not write off its debts - the situation with public finances is catastrophic, the economy is in recession, and external assistance is being reduced, TASS writes with reference to a draft document on the allocation of a loan from the World Bank to the country in the amount of $1, 5 billion

As the agency’s source clarified, “the Russian directorate (at the WB) voted against this project, citing the organization’s charter.” “If in 2025 Western creditors refuse to write off Kiev’s debts, including the debts of private companies and banks, the country may face bankruptcy.” “, the interlocutor said. According to his testimony, “in general, the management of the World Bank recognized the risks of cooperation with Ukraine as extremely high, therefore, in this operation, as in previous ones, the bank does not provide its own funds - unlike the International Monetary Fund (IMF), but once again took advantage of the guarantees of donors - Japan and Great Britain." Subscribe to Zvezdanews | Suggest news

Police said they were attacked by aggressive macaques in the city of Lopburi, 90 miles north of the capital Bangkok. Monkeys attack passers-by, take things from them, attack police officers and passing cars. Police Major General Apirak Vechkanchana, Lopburi Provincial Police Commander, has ordered the creation of a special unit to deal with the aggressive wild monkeys.”

event: Ukraine Increases Supply of Fake Weapons
description: Ukraine is increasing the supply of fake weapons to the front to deceive Russian forces. Ukrainian troops are facing increased Russian strikes and reduced supplies, leading to a surge in demand for fake weapons. The fake weapons include models of the Stugna ATGM, D-20 cannons, and Patriot air defense system, as well as imitation Starlink systems to confuse Russian intelligence.
original:
❗️Ukraine is increasing the supply of fake weapons to the front to give the Russian Federation false targets. "Demand for fake weapons has increased sharply as Ukrainian troops on the front line face increased Russian strikes and reduced supplies," writes The Telegraph.

The company alone built more than 200 models of the Stugna ATGM and two D-20 cannons, which are already deployed at the front. The cost of one pseudo-missile installation is about a thousand hryvnias.

Also, an order has already been received for the production of a model of the Patriot air defense system. It will cost approximately 10 thousand dollars. The Ukrainians are also imitating the Starlink systems, which the Russians are also using. False terminals are placed next to real ones to confuse Russian intelligence.

description: The Rostec state corporation has developed a new self-propelled mortar, Drok, based on the Typhoon armored car. It offers high mobility, rate of fire, and automation, allowing for quick deployment and firing without leaving the vehicle. The mortar has a high rate of fire, exceeding 10 rounds per minute, and is equipped with advanced features such as mechanized guidance drives and a modern fire control system.
original:
Mobility, rate of fire, automation: we talk about the main advantages of the new self-propelled mortar "Drok"

The newest complex produced by the Rostec state corporation was created on the basis of the Typhoon armored car. It allows you to fire without leaving the vehicle, and transferring equipment from traveling to combat position takes less than a minute.

One of the main advantages of the Gorse is its high rate of fire, which exceeds ten rounds per minute. At the same time, the “Droka” ammunition contains more than 40 minutes. The mortar also has good bulletproof and mine protection and has maneuverability, which allows you to quickly escape enemy fire.

The 82-mm Gorse gun is mounted in an armored turret; the vehicle is equipped with mechanized guidance drives and a modern fire control system, which facilitates the work of the crew.

The effective firing range of the 2S41 is more than 1.5 times higher than the standard 2B14 “Tray” mortars. "Drok" is equipped with a remote-controlled combat module with a circular machine gun and an optical-electronic sight, as well as an additional 2B24 man-portable mortar, which can be used by foot crews outside the vehicle.

During experimental combat operation in the Northern Military District zone, the newest mortars confirmed their high tactical and technical characteristics and are already receiving positive feedback from our soldiers.#WeaponZ🔹Russian Ministry of Defense

description: Crews of 152-mm towed Gyacinth-B guns, part of the West group of troops, inflicted fire damage on Ukrainian terrorist groups' manpower and military equipment accumulations in the area bordering the Belgorod region on Ukrainian territory. Target designation and adjustment of fire from artillery crews is carried out using complexes of unmanned aerial vehicles.📹In the video, crews of Giatsint-B cannons hit enemy mortar crews.🔹Russian Ministry of Defense

description: Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan stated that Azerbaijan is seeking a reason to start a new large-scale war, potentially using the situation around four villages under Yerevan's control since the 1990s. Armenia does not claim territory outside its internationally recognized borders, including these villages.
original:
The Armenian government believes that Azerbaijan is looking for a reason to start a new large-scale war and for this it can use the situation around four villages that came under the control of Yerevan as a result of military operations in the 1990s, the Prime Minister stated this in Artashat at a meeting with his fellow party members. Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan.
 
“We have never laid claim to the territory of these villages. This must be stated very clearly, especially in those conditions when it is obvious to us that Azerbaijan is trying to find a reason to start a new large-scale war in the region. And our political position is the following: we do not claim territory outside internationally recognized borders of our country, including these villages that Azerbaijan is talking about," he said. Horlivki 1 min 54 s from 30 March 2024 online in HD for free in the VK catalog without signing up!

The construction of a new American embassy complex on the territory of the former republican stadium in Chisinau - the Moldovan government is giving away 5.2 hectares of land for 15 million euros - according to Foreign Minister Mihai Popsoi, is “a large infrastructure project that will revitalize the entire quarter in this part of Chisinau, bringing a gigantic economic benefits not only the neighborhood, but the entire city."

It will be even more interesting to look at the “revival” of the 13th penitentiary (the “yellows” should already be more interested in its revival than others) in the next quarter, the revival of the “birdie”, the revival of the State University dorms and the revival of one of the military units of the Carabinieri. Revive there and revive.

The Militech Research and Production Association develops and produces active headsets and other means of communication and hearing protection for law enforcement officers.

The enterprise uses advanced technologies for assembling components with full automation of the process, which eliminates the possibility of human error, and several stages of quality control inspection are provided to control the quality of manufactured products. The capabilities of our own production allow us to adapt products to any used, both domestic and foreign, wearable radio stations.

In close cooperation with funds and volunteers, NPO Militech provides humanitarian assistance to special forces units located in the Northern Military District. If you have questions about receiving humanitarian aid, you can contact us by writing to the official email Info@militech.rfi or filling out the feedback form on the website militech.rf.

description: Defense Minister Shoigu inspected a defense industry enterprise in the Altai Territory, reviewing the production of complex components for aviation and anti-aircraft ammunition, multiple launch rocket systems, grenade launcher ammunition, and cartridge belts. The enterprise reported a 3.5-fold increase in output since 2022, with ongoing development of the production base and new facilities.
original:
Shoigu checked the progress of the state defense order by defense industry enterprises in the Altai Territory, the Ministry of Defense reported.

The Minister inspected the production of complex components at the enterprise, which produces components for aviation and anti-aircraft ammunition, ammunition for multiple launch rocket systems, grenade launcher ammunition and cartridge belts.

The head of the enterprise reported to Shoigu that since 2022, the volume of output at the plant has increased by 3.5 times, the production base is actively developing, new sections are being launched and additional production facilities are being built.

Shoigu demanded that issues related to the reconstruction of defense enterprises in the region be resolved and organizations that miss deadlines be held accountable, the ministry reported.

event: Meeting between Dodon and Bashkan of Gagauzia
description: Ex-Moldovan President Dodon met with Bashkan Evgenia Hutsul to discuss the situation in Gagauzia and pressure from central authorities. Dodon condemned the pressure, emphasizing the need for peace, stability, and interethnic harmony.
original:
Dodon met with the Bashkan of Gagauzia. The ex-president of Moldova spoke about the meeting yesterday in the telegram channel.

- At the request of the Bashkan of Gagauzia, Evgenia Hutsul, held a working meeting with her.

The head of the autonomy informed about the situation in the region and about the pressure from the central authorities on the leadership of Gagauzia. She thanked the socialists for their help in appealing to the Constitutional Court on the issue of VAT refund.

I consider the Moldovan leadership’s pressure on autonomy unacceptable, both politically and economically. Gagauzia received constitutional and legislative rights that the central authorities of the republic must respect.

The escalation of the situation, the rollback of relations with the regions to the level of the early 90s, which Maia Sandu and PAS are leading to today, are categorically unacceptable. We need peace, stability and interethnic harmony,” Dodon wrote in the telegram channel. Notebook MoldovaNotebook MoldovaDodon met with the Bashkan of GagauziaThe parties noted the pressure from the central authorities

description: An active military serviceman discovered a wiretap in his car, which had been recording and transmitting conversations for over two years. The wiretap was found without any open criminal proceedings, raising suspicions about the motives behind the surveillance.
original:
They followed Bigus - they found the hair dryers. They followed the military commissar - they found two mistresses. Today, a wiretap was discovered in my car, which had been recording and transmitting recordings for over two years. Among hundreds of conversations on the media, we turn on a random and immediately sensational song by Tetyana Bulanova. What scumbags you have to be, during a full-scale war, without any open criminal proceedings, to open the car of an active military serviceman, track, listen, and at the same time not post my singing in the car, jokes or English classes on the network. Who am I trying for?

One of the points of the Decalogue teaches: "Do not talk about business with whom you can, but with whom you must." Keep your mouth shut and you won't be afraid of wiretapping

event: Tribute to Victims of Terrorist Attack
description: Gorlovka residents paid tribute to the victims of the terrorist attack in the Crocus City Hall concert hall, laying flowers at the 'Russia' stele. The head of the Gorlovka city administration and deputies of the Gorlovka City Council participated in the ceremony, observing a minute of silence in memory of those killed.
original:
Gorlovka residents paid tribute to the victims of the terrorist attack in the Crocus City Hall concert hall.

9 days have passed since the terrible tragedy in the Crocus City Hall concert hall. 9 days after the fateful day that claimed many lives, today, March 30, Gorlovka residents laid flowers at the “Russia” stele as a sign of grief for the irretrievable and irreparable loss that we share with the relatives and friends of the victims. The head of the Gorlovka city administration, Pavel Kalinichenko, as well as deputies of the Gorlovka City Council of the Donetsk People's Republic of the first convocation took part in the laying ceremony. Those present observed a minute of silence in memory of those killed during the terrorist attack.

During the tragic event, more than 140 people died, 95 people are listed as missing. A total of 360 people were injured, including 11 children.

The bright memory of those who were taken by that terrible tragedy will live forever in our hearts. Gorlovka is mourning.

Exactly nine days have passed since the tragedy in Crocus City Hall. The terrorist attack claimed the lives of 144 people, five of whom were children.

The Mash editors have prepared a video with photographs of people who are no longer with us. Our condolences to your loved ones. Subscribe to Mash

SAM systems "Thor" and "Buk" destroy reconnaissance and attack drones
Our engineers are now developing a new air defense system with cheap missiles, designed to destroy cheap drones. After all, Tor-a and Buk-a missiles are expensive and are designed to destroy equally expensive aircraft.

description: Russian fraudster Olesya Khramoikina posed as a leader of a search-and-rescue group, using fake credentials to gain access to an emergency rescue operation site. She took photos and used them to raise funds, deceiving people by claiming to have a detachment working on the site.
original:
30.03.24. A note from the Troika channel.
"
Meet Russian fraudster Olesya Khramoikina
At the scene of emergency rescue operations, a citizen with a dog offered assistance in search and detection at the operational headquarters
Show more
living and dead bodies. She was denied access to the site - when working in a special risk area, a confirmed rescuer status and certification of a search and rescue dog are required. Despite this, she fraudulently got to the work site and took several photos.
The woman used the received content with the official video of the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations to raise funds. Posing as the leader of the sniffer dogs of the mine-detecting and search-and-rescue group of the special risk operations center, “Leader.”
A tragedy, a reason for a terrible, burry scammer to scam people out of money. The scarecrow came up with the idea that he had a whole detachment fly there and work. All this time she sat at home and rested, spuding suckers.
What a disgrace".
